__TOC__

* Ubuntu hour - lectures for beginners were held in Belgrade haklab, every Tuesday.

* Sat, 23 March 2013 10:00 - 19:00 UTC <nowiki>[[https://events.lugons.org/?lang=en|LUGoNS BarCamp]]</nowiki> conference was held at Novi Sad. Serbian LoCo team was present at event with lecture about Ubuntu and upcoming release of Ubuntu 13.04.

* Ubuntu lectures for beginners was held at Zajecar (Thursday 21st March), Novi Sad (Friday 22nd March) and Subotica (Sunday 24th March).

* On Wednesday 27th March Serbian LoCo was present at Document Freedom day at Subotica. Short lecture about new 
release of Ubuntu 13.04 was held.

* On Saturday 3rd, 10th, 17th 24th and 31st March, Administration team meeting was held.
